short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spend your Laso Finance cards with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join Laso Finance, the easy way to spend your coins anywhere Visa prepaid is accepted. 💳

Add Laso Finance to your browser, connect + deposit ERC-20 coins, and issue prepaid cards straight from your non-custodial wallet, such as MetaMask.

📝 Note: We are experiencing degraded spendability in France, Portugal, Finland and Italy.

🌟 Key Features:
- Seamless Integration: Effortlessly connect and deposit your ERC-20 tokens.
- Instant Prepaid Visa Cards: Issue your cards without any fees and start shopping immediately.
- Universal Acceptance: Enjoy the power to spend anywhere Visa prepaid is recognized.

💸 How We Make It Free or Low Fee:
Our unique model involves acquiring bulk gift cards at significant discounts, passing on the savings to you, so you enjoy this innovative service without any, or low fees.

📣 We're All Ears:
Please let us know if you see anything we can improve on. Contact us at support@laso.finance or join our Telegram community at @LasoFinance.

🌍 Compatibility:
- U.S. Card: Spend USD with U.S. merchants within the United States.
- CAD Card: Dedicated for CAD spending with Canadian merchants in Canada.
- International Card: Global spending freedom. Just a single 3.8% fee at card purchase. No currency exchange fee.

📜 Usage Terms:
These cards are virtual and non-reloadable. The U.S. card can only spend USD with U.S. merchants inside the United States. The CAD card can only spend CAD with Canadian merchants inside Canada. The international card can be spent worldwide. Inside this extension, usage requires that you are 18 years of age or older, and agree to the Laso Finance Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, E-Sign Disclosure, and Cardholder Agreement.
